name: Taoist Survivor
description:
In ancient times, there was a mountain known as "Yaoshan" The highest peak on this mountain is called the "Tianjie" You will venture to this mountain to gather rare treasures, face the tribulations of thunder, encounter numerous opportunities, wield powerful artifacts, learn countless immortal techniques, display divine skills, vanquish cunning demons, defeat mighty demon lords, and acquire celestial treasures and artifacts!

Beginner Tips:

Killing demons grants immediate experience for leveling up, which provides skill or attribute selections.
Consume peaches and lingzhi mushrooms to increase cultivation, rapidly advancing your realm. Each advancement brings a significant opportunity (a unique enhancement).
Pay attention to your shield bar; it only protects against physical damage, not magical or true damage.
Being struck by lightning on the Heavenly Tribulation Peak can swiftly increase cultivation but also inflicts considerable magical damage.
When stuck, consider cliff jumping, which only consumes 25% of your health and teleports you to a random location.
